PrepaidInsurance.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for insurance that provides economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
ProceedsFromConvertibleDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Equity
ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The net cash inflow or outflow resulting from the entity's share transaction.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOilAndGasPropertyAndEq.label: Proceeds from Sale of Oil and Gas Property and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfOilAndGasPropertyAndEq.description: The cash inflow to dispose of long-lived, physical assets and mineral interests in oil and gas properties used for normal oil and gas operations.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Additions
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.label: Repayments of Convertible Debt
RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfSeniorDebt.label: Repayments of Senior Debt
RepaymentsOfSeniorDebt.description: The cash outflow for a long-term debt where the holder has highest claim on the entity's asset in case of bankruptcy or liquidation during the period.

ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.label: Results of Operations, Income Tax Expense
ResultsOfOperationsIncomeTaxExpense.description: Income tax expense for oil and gas producing activities.

ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.label: Results of Operations, Oil and Gas Producing Activities Net Income (Excluding Corporate Overhead and Interest Costs)
ResultsOfOperationsOilAndGasProducingAct.description: The results of operations for oil and gas producing activities, excluding corporate overhead and interest costs.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.label: Revisions of Previous Quantity Estimates
RevisionsOfPreviousQuantityEstimates.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of revisions of estimated quantity of oil and gas in proved reserves.

SelfInsuranceReserve.label: Self Insurance Reserve
SelfInsuranceReserve.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions) of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.

SelfInsuranceReserveNoncurrent.label: Self Insurance Reserve, Noncurrent
SelfInsuranceReserveNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property that are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Additional Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of additional shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flow of Proved Oil and Gas Reserves, Other
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in standardized measure of discounted future net cash flow as a result of changes from other sources.

StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.label: Standardized Measure of Discounted Future Net Cash Flows Relating to Proved Oil and Gas Reserves
StandardizedMeasureOfDiscountedFutureNet.description: Amount of discounted future accumulated cash inflow relating to proved oil and gas reserves.

StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.label: State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.description: Amount of state and local current and deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesDividendRei.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesDividendRei.description: Number of shares issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the shareholders to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number, after forfeiture, of shares or units issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes shares or units issued under employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount.description: Amount of a stock repurchase plan authorized by an entity's Board of Directors.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

UnbilledReceivablesCurrent.label: Unbilled Receivables, Current
UnbilledReceivablesCurrent.description: Amount received for services rendered and products shipped, but not yet billed, for non-contractual agreements due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.
